attributes.action: guarantee that anyone convicted of an offence which involves violence or the threat of violence is imprisoned.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many convicted people are released with suspended sentences, community service or small fines (which mostly don't get paid). In order to protect the general public, I wish the PM to guarantee that anyone who used violence or the threat of violence is taken off the streets.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=violence
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
